answers.answer: Aww I'm sorry mama sending prayers your way
I'm so sorry for your loss I can tell ur a strong woman may your beautiful child rest in peace. God bless u.

I can only imagine the emotions you must be facing right now. I am deeply sorry for the loss of your baby. Take comfort in knowing he is at peace and with god. I will be praying for you and your family
So sorry hon! You'll have an angel watching over you now. Praying for you and your family
Im so sorry to hear the hunn, I couldn't imagine the but my heart goes out to.you. May he rest in paradise and watch over you. Thus made me rest. Your a strong woman
This made me tear*
Your such a strong woman!!!. My heart goes out to u. I knoe ure baby is happy n resting high above with all the other Angels. My prayers are with u n ure family
Sorry for your lost.
Sorry to hear that you nd your family are in my prayers
Im so sorry for your lost. May god comfort your aching heart. Just know your guardian angel Tristan will always watch over you! God bless!

I remember reading your post a while back.. I'm so sorry to hear that, no one should go through that but unfortunately that's how life is :(( may God give you the strength to get through all of this, he's gone but never forgotten.. Your baby is another angel watching over you :(
Oh so sorry it must be hard but you seem very strong..
Im sorry for your loss.
sorry for your lost my prayers are going out to you and your family
God bless you and your family. So sorry for your loss.
Made me tear up I can't Imagine your pain I'm soooooooooo sorry for your loss Momma:/
Praying for you Hun.
So sorry about your baby boy.
Prayers for you & your family.
Thank you all for your kind words. Yes my angel is watching over us. It is hard but God knows best
Im so sorry for ur loss.. he's an angel now and watching over u.. may he R.I.P.. God bless u
I'm so sorry! You will see him again one day mommy. The loss of a child is just speechless pain..my thoughts and prayers are with you and your family.

I'm truly sorry for your loss. It is such a hard thing for a mother to loose a child and all the whirl wind emotions that come along with it. I know this terrible pain. Someday you will be reunited in the kingdom of heaven.  My prayers are with you and your family.
Im sorry to hear that. Prayers to you and your family.

Praying for all of you. God decided he needed another angel. He will feel no pain in Heaven. Remember 2nd Corinthinans says "my grace is enough for you. when you are weak my power is made perfect in you."

question: Hello all. As some of you may know me, i am Michelle, mother of Tristan who was diagnosed with trisomy 18 in May. Well at 34 weeks n 4 days i had to be induced due to preeclampsia. Tristan was born at 3:21 pm 08/30/13 n passed away 4:26 8/30/13. He was 3 lbs 2 oz. N very beautiful. He had heart failure n held on for as long as he could. He died peacefully. Looked as if he was sleeping. Family n i are doing ok as we had prepared. Thank you to all who prayed n supposed Tristan n I. #Godbless.
title: Tristan was called home
